long_description: Great for touring or commuting, the Electra Verse 21D women's bike brings effortless style and an irrepressible sense of fun to every ride. Aluminum frame features internal cable routing for clean lines and protection from road grime; eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (sold separately) enhance utility. Sweeping top tube mimics a step-through design for easy mounting and dismounting. Shimano trigger shifters control the Shimano derailleurs for easy, precise shifts between the 21 gear combinations, letting you pedal with ease. Road-style, dual-pivot caliper brakes ensure speed management is easy and effective. Mixed Tread tires supply great versatility, providing smooth-rolling performance on roads, paths and hardpacked gravel. Convenient platform pedals do not require special shoes. Specs on the Electra Verse 21D women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: Great for touring or commuting, the Electra Verse 21D women's bike brings effortless style and an irrepressible sense of fun to every ride.
